entry.title: Victoria 3 Game Scraping
entry.summary: A tool to strip data from a game and compile a database
entry.content:
The Game/ The Problem

Initial Approach

Continue from ck3 project Process games directly in one thread Alchemy for DB

Big Problems

oom system lockup resource utilization Need to do all in one

Re-attempt as seperate processes collect/process

Still too slow End up using 3p tool to scrape replays instead of lark bla

Fonal Lesson, using GNU coreutils

GNU parallel is good
